golden_queries: Which line is Chinatown MRT on

"Chinatown MRT station" "North East Line" "Downtown Line" Singapore official site:lta.gov.sg

REASONING: Chinatown MRT station is not on the green line. According to the official Land Transport Authority (LTA) website, Chinatown MRT station is located on the North East Line (Purple) and Downtown Line (Blue), with station code NE4/DT19.
The SBS Transit website confirms that Chinatown Station operates on the North East (NE) Line with purple line branding and connects to the Downtown Line (DT19) with blue line branding.
Multiple travel guide sources consistently state that the East West Line (EWL) is the green line, while the North East Line (NEL) is purple and the Downtown Line (DTL) is blue.

The Traveloka travel guide explicitly lists the MRT line colors: North South Line (NSL) - Red, East West Line (EWL) - Green, Circle Line (CCL) - Orange, North East Line (NEL) - Purple, Downtown Line (DTL) - Blue, Thomson-East Coast Line (TEL) - Brown.
All reliable sources confirm that Chinatown MRT is on the purple North East Line and blue Downtown Line, not the green East West Line.
